mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.prop_id AS "propId", a.value AS "value", a.create_id AS "createId.id", a.create_time AS "createTime", a.status AS "status"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO biz_cate_prop_value( id, prop_id, value, create_id, create_time, status ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{propId}, #{value}, #{createId.id}, #{createTime}, #{status} )
